facet_1.name: Buddy System
facet_1.effects: While Bodyguard is active, Marci's lifesteal heals her ally and the ally's lifesteal heals Marci. +1s Duration

facet_2.name: Pick-Me-Up
facet_2.effects: Enables Rebound Alt-Cast functionality. Marci carries the unit-targeted ally with her to the landing radius after the leap component. Increases landing damage when carrying an ally. +35% Ally Landing Damage

facet_3.name: Fleeting Fury
facet_3.effects: Upon landing with Rebound, Marci gains a short Unleashed Fury combo.

effects: Applies a basic dispel on Marci upon cast
While Unleash is Active, all of Marci's abilities unleash pulses when cast
Unleash pulses now also silence units within the radius
Adds enemy targeting functionality for Rebound
Marci applies the movement speed boost on herself upon cast

abilities.name: Special Delivery
abilities.description: Marci whistles and instantly teleports her Courier to her. Her faction starts the game with more robust Flying Couriers.
abilities.details: Professional courtesy, from one courier to another.

ability_1.name: Dispose
ability_1.details: Grabs the unit-targeted ally or enemy unit and throws it effortlessly behind her, damaging and slowing the unit if it's an enemy. Additionally damages and applies a movement speed slow to all enemy units within the landing radius.
ability_1.description: Marci excels at removing obstacles from Princess Mirana's path.
technical_details: Can Dispose units up to 230Â° of a circular segment in front of Marci's facing angle without turning
Landing distance varies correspondingly to the unit's previous location upon cast
Can land at max 250-distance from point behind Marci
interaction_notes: Both Roshan and the Tormentor are immune to forced movement sources
All ability effects are applied immediately at their current position

ability_2.name: Rebound
ability_2.details: Marci bounds to the targeted unit, choosing a direction and distance she will spring away from it. Grants the targeted ally a short duration movement speed bonus. Upon reaching the unit, Marci leaps to her final destination, damaging and stunning enemies in the area.
ability_2.description: With a friendly or brazen boost, Marci can find her way into the midst of any fight.

facet_effects.fleeting_fury: Upon landing with Rebound, Marci gains a short Unleashed Fury combo
facet_effects.pick_me_up: Enables Rebound Alt-Cast functionality. Marci carries the unit-targeted ally with her to the landing radius after the leap component

technical_details: Can move over impassable terrain and over trees
interaction_notes: Cannot be cast on Buildings, Couriers, Invulnerable units, or Ward-type units
Nullifies the ability cast on unit-targeted enemy upon being disjointed

ability_3.name: Bodyguard
ability_3.details: Grants a target ally hero a portion of Marci's lifesteal and attack damage bonuses. Whenever the ally attacks or is attacked by an enemy, Marci counter-attacks that target within a certain distance. Passively grants Marci lifesteal and bonus attack damage.
ability_3.description: Marci learned at a young age that the best asset in a scrap is a steady companion.

facet_effects.buddy_system: While Bodyguard is active, Marci's lifesteal heals her ally and the ally's lifesteal heals Marci. Increases duration.

technical_details: Grants flat unique bonus attack damage
Counter-attack component has a fixed duration downtime
interaction_notes: Cannot be cast on Hidden or Invulnerable units
Lifesteal is less effective when attacking creeps

ability_4.name: Unleash
ability_4.details: Taps a hidden power, increasing movement speed while gaining flurry charges that allow Marci to deliver a rapid sequence of strikes. Unlocks max attack speed upon cast. All Flurry attacks must be executed within the combo time window, otherwise, the combo fails and dispels the Flurry buff.
ability_4.description: Though some have sought to understand its origins, Marci rebuffs all attempts to divine the source of her power.
technical_details: The last strike in every flurry combo unleashes a damaging pulse around the target
interaction_notes: Unlocks max attack speed and removes the 700 attack speed cap
Applies a basic dispel on Marci with Scepter upgrade

changes: Reduced Rebound mana cost from 75/90/105/120 to 70/80/90/100
Increased Rebound Pick-Me-Up landing damage bonus factor with ally from 0.25 to 0.35
Bodyguard Buddy System now increases buff duration by 1
Reduced Rebound landing damage from 80/160/240/320 to 75/150/225/300
Reduced Pick-Me-Up landing damage bonus factor with ally from 0.5 to 0.25
Reduced Aghanim's Shard Rebound landing damage bonus from a 1.2 factor to a flat 15/30/45/60
